game.Player

game   
 

Uses of Player in game
 

Subclasses of Player in game
(package private)  class ClientPlayer
          A kind of Player that gets its commands from a remote program, and runs as a client of that remote program.
(package private)  class FakePlayer
           
(package private)  class GUIPlayer
          A kind of Player that reads its commands from a GUI and displays the state of the board.
(package private)  class HostPlayer
          A kind of Player that gets its commands from a remote program, and runs as a host of that remote program.
(package private)  class HumanPlayer
          A kind of Player that reads its commands from the standard input.
(package private)  class MachinePlayer
          A kind of Player that computes commands.

(package private)  void Game.setTurn(Player player)
          Sets the Color of the next turn (next move) according to the Color of the given Player.
